  • Constructor Details

    • WaitingViewModel

      public WaitingViewModel(Game gameModel, Team teamModel, Character characterModel)
      Constructs the waiting view model and sets the needed model instances. Also initializes all values needed for the bindings. Subscribes to events from the character model and initializes the socket connection.
      Parameters:
      gameModel - game model instance
      teamModel - team model instance
      characterModel - character model instance

  • Method Details

    • changeStartButtonEnabledProperty

      private void changeStartButtonEnabledProperty(PropertyChangeEvent event)
      This method is called when the ready status in the character model changes. It sets the players greeting value and enables or disables the start button.
      Parameters:
      event - property change event

    • changeRedirectToGameProperty

      private void changeRedirectToGameProperty(PropertyChangeEvent event)
      This method is called when the game running status in the character model is true. It notifies all subscribers of the waiting view model support.
      Parameters:
      event - property change event

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Triggers the start of the game via the socket connection.

    • quitWaiting

      public void quitWaiting()
      Triggers the stop of the socket connection.

      public javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty getTeamLivesHiddenProperty(int lifeIndex)
      Method for the binding of the visibility of a life with the given index with an element in the view.
      Parameters:
      lifeIndex - the index of the life
      Returns:
      flag for the visibility of the team life with the given index
